item.title: Words and sentences: names of animals given by Tamme at the museum
item.summary: Tamme (and occasionally !nanni) provides Lloyd with the !kun names of animals, birds and insects at the South African Museum.
item.comments: 1) Inserts on the inside front cover of Book XI & XII-9: pencil and pen script in Lloyd's hand concerning birds and insects, 2) Pages 9682-9757 in this notebook are blank, 3) This is found in Book XI & XII-9
item.author: Tamme (XII)

keyword.subkw: of animals given by Tamme at the SA museum
